entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
